Package it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dice
    Class Dice: representation of the dice, it is characterized by a value (int) and a color (enum)
    DiceBag
    Class DiceBag: representation in the game of the Bag suited for draft the die to use in the game, it's responsible for the creation of the 90 dice of the game and of their shuffle
    DraftPool
    Class DraftPool: representation in the game of the Draft Pool,contains the dice used by the players in the game, it is responsible for the creation and the clean of the pool in every round, it's associated with the Dice Bag, from where the pool draft the die
    GlassBox
    Class GlassBox: representation in the game of a box of the window panel, contains the dice if there's one on it and the constraint value or color of the Pattern Card used by the player during the game.
    Model
    Class Model: the model represents the model of the MVC pattern applied to the project, the class extends Observable because it's observable by the virtual view in case of modification.
    Player
    Class Player: represents a player of the game, it's characterized by a name and an id, every player owns its private and pattern cards, the tokens number and the points obtained at the end of a match.
    RoundTracker
    Class RoundTracker: represents the Round Tracker of the game, it contains the various list of the different dice remained in the draft pool at the end of every round.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DiceColor
    Enumeration useful to represent the color of the Dice
